title: Celebratory
seo_description: Whether you are treating a special someone to a romantic getaway or enjoying a birthday fete, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00PM is also included.
short_description: Whether you are treating a special someone to a romantic getaway or enjoying a birthday fete, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00PM is also included.
full_description:
A nightly Residents Fee of $47 plus tax per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:

  • Sweet and savory breakfast presentations
  • Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages available all day
  • Hours of Indulgence, light fare and curated selection of alcoholic beverages served daily
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access
  • Local and toll-free phone calls
  • 24-hour Fitness Center, on the 3rd floor
  • 24-hour business center services
  • Bottled water in-room

The Residence fee is not inclusive of service gratuities.

Guarantee/Deposit and Change/Cancellation Fees will depend on selected dates and room/rate combination.
